channel.title: SFDoug tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from SFDoug.

item.description: @DrJenGunter I’ve been struggling with my manuscript but started feeling really good about it in the past 3 weeks. Isn’t it great? I look forward to seeing your next book.
@Sally_K All the time! And it’s marvelous to realize too.

@Sally_K If flying out of SFO and not checking luggage, 60 minutes is plenty. If checking luggage, get there an extra 15 minutes earlier. (There is a 24 hr coffee place in the International terminal, pre-security, btw.)

@gtconway3d yes. there have been several studies along these lines. the number is enormous, as ought to be obvious if you simply compare our death tally to that of other countries with similar (or even less) vaccine supply. Hundreds of thousands of lives needlessly lost.

@LeilaFadel @MorningEdition When I was on the @MorningEdition staff (mid-1980s,) my routine included coffee at a 7-11 where I ran into the same Secret Service and MPD officers almost every day. Getting to know others who worked similar schedules helped a lot. The other key lesson: sleep whenever you can!
